cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Improved Logging Capabilities

DocumentPublisher.ContactDetails: Emergency Support: +1 877 228 7302 (toll-free within North America) +1 408 525 6532 (International direct-dial) Non-emergency Support: Email: psirt@cisco.com Support requests that are received via e-mail are typically acknowledged within 48 hours.
DocumentPublisher.IssuingAuthority: Cisco product security incident response is the responsibility of the Cisco Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT). The Cisco PSIRT is a dedicated, global team that manages the receipt, investigation, and public reporting of security vulnerability information that is related to Cisco products and networks. The on-call Cisco PSIRT works 24x7 with Cisco customers, independent security researchers, consultants, industry organizations, and other vendors to identify possible security issues with Cisco products and networks. More information can be found in Cisco Security Vulnerability Policy available at http://www.cisco.com/web/about/security/psirt/security_vulnerability_policy.html

Revision.Description: Updated summary, vulnerable and products confirmed not vulnerable, workarounds, fixed software, and exploitation and public announcements.

DocumentNotes.Note:
Cisco WebEx Meeting Center user accounts are subject to enumeration via Personal Meeting Rooms (PMRs). This advisory documents that an administrative update has been made to improve the logging of connections to the PMRs.
This advisory is available at the following link: http://tools.cisco.com/security/center/content/CiscoSecurityAdvisory/cisco-sa-20160526-wmc["http://tools.cisco.com/security/center/content/CiscoSecurityAdvisory/cisco-sa-20160526-wmc"]

Reference.Description: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Improved Logging Capabilities

ProductTree.FullProductName: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Original Release Base

Vulnerability.Title: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Logging Enhancement

Notes.Note: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center user accounts are subject to enumeration via Personal Meeting Rooms (PMRs). This advisory documents that an administrative update has been made to improve the logging of connections to the PMRs.

Remediation.Description: There are no workarounds that address the referenced functionality.

Reference.Description: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center Improved Logging Capabilities
